targets.query: SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select blocked,running,sleeping,total,total_threads,zombies from processes where  host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(context_switches),1s) AS "context switches"  FROM "kernel" WHERE host =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(processes_forked),1s) as forks FROM "kernel" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(null)
SELECT mean("file-max") as max FROM "linux_sysctl_fs" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(null)
SELECT mean("file-nr") as opened FROM "linux_sysctl_fs" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: host
list.name: host
